Host a "Green Wedding Marketplace" where guests can shop for eco-friendly wedding supplies and vendors can showcase their sustainable products.
Create a "Wedding Wish Tree" where guests can write down their eco-friendly wedding wishes and hang them on a tree, symbolizing the couple's commitment to sustainability.
Design a custom wedding website that calculates the carbon footprint of the wedding and encourages guests to offset their emissions through carbon offsetting projects.
Develop a "Sustainable Wedding Crashers" game where guests compete to see who can find the most eco-friendly wedding supplies and vendors, with prizes for the winners.
Host a "Farm-to-Table Wedding" where the wedding menu features locally sourced, organic, and seasonal ingredients, highlighting the couple's commitment to sustainable and ethical food practices.
